Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks to the effort you and the other farmers
have put forth, we have more countries coming
to trade with us. I wanted to convey my thanks.
<PAGE>
With more trade, we've been seeing more
tourists visiting, and it looks like things will only
get livelier from here.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
To be honest, there's something I'd like to
discuss with you in regard to that.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's wonderful to have tourists visiting us, but to
ensure they keep coming back, the town needs
some sort of attraction.
<PAGE>
After some thought, we decided it would be
nice to open a few areas of the town for
decorating.
<PAGE>
Gunther tells me you have quite the artist's eye.
A born decorator, he said.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, no, I'm sure he speaks the truth. Gunther's
always been conservative when it comes to
doling out praise.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, we'd like to ask you to Edit the
town's many areas. No need to tackle them all at
once; a few at a time is fine. Would you, please?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you! Now, allow me to show you the new
area.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've been given Area Editing rights for this
area here. Now, allow me to explain how to Edit
in town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To begin Editing an area, simply stand in front of
its sign and <BLUE>press the A Button</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
The rest is exactly like Editing your farm.
However, keep in mind that only a limited
number of objects can be used in town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can read up on the details in the book I've
sent to your bookshelf. It should answer any
questions you might have as you decorate.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As trade continues to flourish and more tourists
visit the town, I'll open up more areas for you to
edit.
<PAGE>
But for now, just try experimenting with this
area.
<PAGE>
Anyway, I leave things in your capable hands,
<MYNAME>.
<BLUE>Town Edit</BLUE> has been added to my bookshelf.
